Articles.Content:
Well after a prolonged absence I've made it back to the forum and the Kerbal Space Program.

Have moved from Houston, Missouri to Monroe, Georgia and I'm living with my Son and Grandchildren as my wife of 40 years passed away New Years Day and I couldn't keep the Missouri place going by myself. Things have calmed down a lot now and I'm ready to get back to KSP.

So sorry for your loss, my condolences. It's nice to see you're able to get on and find enjoyment in the little things again.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Welcome back TreverSlyFox, you have my condolences as well.
